participant_1.name: Ella Thompson
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and introspective, Ella enjoys exploring new ideas and perspectives. She values knowledge and self-improvement.
participant_1.background: i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

participant_2.name: Jake Miller
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and practical, Jake is resourceful and enjoys finding creative solutions to problems. He has a gentle spirit but struggles with social situations.
participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
